attributes.action: support British comedians by exempting their earnings from tax.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Comedy provides an important service to the nation, reducing tension and thereby improving public health and public order, saving the tax payer a large fortune.

To compensate British comedians for this public service they should be allowed to keep whatever small fortunes they make.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
